title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - June 17, 2021
itunes:title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - June 17, 2021
description:
Mark and Gary connect to discuss the motivation behind Harvey Weinstein's extradition to Los Angeles and they give a preview of a wild story out of South Carolina that we plan to cover in more detail in the weeks to come.

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
